name: learning-tailwind-css
description: A CSS utility framework. Don't look like a standard Bootstrap site. Configurable with a JS config file. Extendible with custom classes.  (This file was first created using the Yeoman generator generator-hchiam-learning: https://www.npmjs.com/package/generator-hchiam-learning

scripts.start: rm -rf dist || true; parcel src/index.html --out-dir dist --cache-dir .cache --open; # react-scripts start;
scripts.build: rm -rf dist || true; parcel build src/index.html --out-dir dist --cache-dir .cache --no-source-maps; # react-scripts build;

author: hchiam
